title: Samsung attempts DIY emojis with Galaxy S9 launch
text:
Samsung attempts DIY emojis with Galaxy S9 launch Monday, February 26, 2018 - 02:00 
Samsung have launched their Galaxy S9, with augmented reality emojis just one of the new features. But they aren't the only smartphone makers using the Mobile World Congress to launch new products, with Nokia also making a grand reveal at the tech show. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Samsung have launched their Galaxy S9, with augmented reality emojis just one of the new features. But they aren't the only smartphone makers using the Mobile World Congress to launch new products, with Nokia also making a grand reveal at the tech show.
